第一次玩这一类的游戏，在B站视频上看到推荐后就买了游戏。游戏一开始的序章的代入感对我来说很强，玩着玩着就有点害怕了，玩完了INFERNO，有一些感触，有些事情也经历过，所以，有点害怕吧，但是对于我这不玩这FPS的人来说是很有意思的，希望以后的内容更多。

I had put around 100 hours into CS: Source because CS:GO is ass, so I purchased this to see if it was just as good as source. Newsflash: It's not. I'm not all that good at video games in general and I'm just no match for people who have been playing the game for 20 years. And no, there's no bots. I might change my mind later on but for now, I don't recommend this game.
